education.board: Meghnad Saha Institute of Technology, Kolkata

experience.description: Working as a Frontend developer and the main POC of Frontend in Lazypay team. I have worked on may high priority features and enhancements, but a brief description of few of my works are given below.
works_done: Optimisation and security: Worked on enhancing the lighthouse scores and increased security measures for all the web client facing applications of Lazypay.
Increased developer effeciency: To increase developer efficiency I have created component libraries from scratch and to and contributed in github workflow.

Statement Generation Service : I created the statements generation service from scratch. Currently which is serving all types of statements of transaction or loans or other service related statements in PDF format.

experience.description: Working as a React.js developer in Assessment team. Built efficient, responsive and robust Ed-Tech applications from scratch and maintained it. Executed many high priority feature releases. Brief description of few of my works are given below
works_done: Result Generation Service: I am the main POC for the result generation of all the types of exams that takes place on Byju's platform, and also heavily contributed to the migration of the code base to a more efficient technology.
Test Taking Service: Worked and maintained the test taking platform of Byju's. Have contributed to the release of many big tests such as BST,BDT,BNAT,JEE/NEET etc.
Online analytical processing(OLAP) Services: Implemented OLAP services in various tests to monitor the student interaction with the platform, which helps to make the product more engaging.

experience.description: Worked as an React and Angular developer, built robust, responsive HRMS applications  Brief description of a few of the projects are given below
works_done: Analytics Module: This is a module added to handle the performance evaluation of the employees in a more efficient way.
Recruitment Dashboard: This is a module that is added to handle the interview process for the interviewer in a cleaner and more efficient way.
Candidate Web Service: This module is created to handle the job application process and tracking all the statuses of the application phase in a cleaner way for the candidates.
Travel and Expenses Module: This module is created to handle the travel expenses and the other reimbursements of the employees.

internships.description: Made many solo Frontend, Backend and Fullstack projects using HTML,CSS,Javascript and MERN stack

projects_one.project_name: An exact copy of Github issues page
details: • An exact copy of Github issues page
• A game to test quick math abilities of the user
• Solve the math problems within the given time
• On left-clicking each cell it will display the number of bombs around it.
• Successfully flag all the bombs to win.

skills.libraries: React.js, Next.js, Redux, React-Redux, Redux-thunk, Redux-saga, Axios, React testing library, Jest, Service Worker, Web Worker
skills.tools: Webpack 5, Rollup, Vite, Github workflow, Babel, Eslint, Sentry.

achievements.text: • Was awarded for my exceptional levels of Ownership, Openness, and Collaboration by Laurent Le Moal(Group CEO, PayU).
• Was awarded for the 'Ownership and Accountability' in Byju's Tech-X, the annual award distribution ceremony of Byju's.
